long_description: Offering an extra measure of security to keep your paddle attached to your kayak, the North Water Coiled Paddle Leash features a rip-and-stick attachment and an easy-to-use clip. High-quality coil stretches from 1.5 to 5.5 ft. and snaps back to its original shape. Clip snaps securely on to a deck line, while 1.5 in. webbing with rip-and-stick strap securely wrap around the paddle shaft. Stainless steel swivels on both ends eliminate twisting and help ensure the leash's long life. Designed to attach to paddle and watercraft.
short_description: Offering an extra measure of security to keep your paddle attached to your kayak, the North Water Coiled Paddle Leash features a rip-and-stick attachment and an easy-to-use clip.
